original_text: He called out to his own special servant. He told him, ‘Throw this woman out of my house! Then lock the door after she has gone.’
korean_text: 그가 부리는 종을 불러 이르되 이 계집을 내게서 이제 내보내고 곧 문빗장을 지르라 하니

sentences.original_text: He called out to his own special servant
Throw this woman out of my house
Then lock the door after she has gone
